lines: Stay afraid, but do it anyway. What’s important is the action. You don’t have to wait to be confident. Just do it and eventually the confidence will follow.
author: <Author:0x00007f1879fc7770>

lines: One must have the adventurous daring to accept oneself as a bundle of possibilities and undertake the most interesting game in the world - making the most of one's best.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a023b60>

lines: Be proud to wear you.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a05ca00>

lines: I was always looking outside myself for strength and confidence but it comes from within. It is there all the time.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a0ba970>

lines: Every small positive change we make in ourselves repays us in confidence in the future.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a0fea80>

lines: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a17b0d0>

lines: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a1b23f0>

lines: Love in action is service.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a229540>

lines: Where there is love there is life.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a27bf98>

lines: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a2b4028>

lines: A friend may be waiting behind a stranger’s face.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a306620>

lines: Wherever we are, it is our friends that make our world.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a343930>

lines: Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you; spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a39d908>

lines: There’s not a word yet for old friends who’ve just met.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a476028>

lines: There are good ships and wood ships, ships that sail the sea, but the best ships are friendships, may they always be!
author: <Author:0x00007f187a4b6e70>

lines: At 211 degrees, water is hot. At 212 degrees, it boils. And with boiling water, comes steam. And with steam, you can power a train.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a5da068>

lines: The key of persistence opens all doors closed by resistance.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a617c10>

lines: You keep putting one foot in front of the other, and then one day you look back and you've climbed a mountain.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a659db8>

lines: To persist with a goal, you must treasure the dream more than the costs of sacrifice to attain it.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a6eb858>

lines: Failure cannot cope with persistence.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a712408>

lines: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a73edc8>

lines: A highly developed values system is like a compass. It serves as a guide to point you in the right direction when you are lost.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a76de20>

lines: Just don’t give up trying what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don’t think you can go wrong.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a7aa9d8>

lines: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better, too.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a7dad90>

lines: The most important thing is to try and inspire people so that they can be great in whatever they want to do.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a81b408>

lines: Bad things do happen; how I respond to them defines my character and the quality of my life. I can choose to sit in perpetual sadness... or I can choose to rise from the pain and treasure the most precious gift I have—life itself.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a8549d8>

lines: Show me someone who has done something worthwhile, and I’ll show you someone who has overcome adversity.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a8a5220>

lines: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a8db640>

lines: Getting over a painful experience is much like crossing monkey bars. You have to let go at some point in order to move forward.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a90c358>

lines: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a9428e0>

lines: The creative is the place where no one else has ever been. You have to leave the city of your comfort and go into the wilderness of your intuition.
author: <Author:0x00007f187a9dd430>

lines: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
author: <Author:0x00007f187aa214c8>
